Uses of Package
com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process

  • Packages that use com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process 
    Package Description
    com.mobilab.accountservice  
    com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process  
    com.mobilab.accountservice.service  
  • Classes in com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process used by com.mobilab.accountservice 
    Class and Description
    Database
    MongoDB interface for connection and CRUD operations on accounts and logs
    Gateway
    A process which is responsible to get requests from restful API and send them to topics to be processed by business handlers
  • Classes in com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process used by com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process 
    Class and Description
    Database
    MongoDB interface for connection and CRUD operations on accounts and logs
    Handler
    a super class for processing nodes (gateway & business handler) that implements a shutdown hook to perform stop operations such as closing the connection and releasing resources when the process is terminating, for example by pressing CTRL + C in terminal
  • Classes in com.mobilab.accountservice.bussiness.process used by com.mobilab.accountservice.service 
    Class and Description
    Database
    MongoDB interface for connection and CRUD operations on accounts and logs
    Gateway
    A process which is responsible to get requests from restful API and send them to topics to be processed by business handlers
